statements: SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback;
SELECT performance_rating, user_id FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, performance_rating FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE performance_rating > 4.0;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, performance_rating FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE performance_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE user_id = 123 AND performance_rating < 3.0;
SELECT feedback_text, performance_rating FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improve%' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT feedback_text FROM RoboAdvisorFeedback WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, user_id FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY feedback_date;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT user_id, rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT month, recommendations_met FROM performance_metrics WHERE month >= '2022-01-01' AND month <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendation_count FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT month, assets_under_management FROM performance_metrics WHERE month >= '2022-01-01' AND month <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_recommendations > 1;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT recommendation_text, service_type, service_date FROM RecommendationServices WHERE service_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT metric_id, accuracy, performance_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT recommendation_text, service_type FROM RecommendationServices WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY recommendation_text ASC;
SELECT user_name, feedback_text FROM UserProfiles JOIN UserFeedback ON UserProfiles.user_id = UserFeedback.user_id WHERE UserFeedback.rating < 3 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT recommended_stock, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT metric_id, accuracy, performance_rating FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommended_stock, recommendation_date FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback JOIN users ON user_feedback.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT metric_id, recommendation_id, accuracy, performance_rating FROM performance_metrics WHERE performance_rating IS NULL;
